title: BAN KI-MOON SAYS SL SHOULD SERIOUSLY CONSIDER THE RECOMMENDATIONS MADE BY THE DARUSMAN REPORT
content: A meeting took place between UN Secretary General Ban Ki Moon and Sri Lanka’s permanent representative to the UN Dr. Palitha Kohona. During the daily press briefing at the UN Headquarters, UN Secretary General’s spokesperson Martin Neserky said the Secretary General had reiterated two points during this meeting….
